generatePseudoProperties.description: Generate a pseudo properties file in same folder as the provided developer properties file

params.name: oDocument
params.description: oDocument object of the developer properties file

generatePseudoPropertiesProject.description: Recursively generate pseudo properties file for each developer properties found under given folder

is2QEnabled.description: Checks if 2Q is enabled for a specific project. A project is considered 2Q enabled if set in project.json translation.supportedLanguages contains en_us_sappsd

params.name: oDocument
params.description: Document of Web IDE inside some project
